title: cant play the game.
body: After pick champion and game start, the client back to desktop and show me "Reconnect" After I click Reconnect, it gonna back to the desktop again.

replies.body: Likely an issue related to content discussed in [this](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/sB4ucqXc-game-client-anti-cheat-changes-going-live) thread.  I recommend reading through that and posting there if you continue to have problems.
I have the same issue, and I have fixed by closing all the firewalls you have so far. Some firewalls block the process of LOL and stop connecting to the server.
Already tried re-install and initiate full repair. I just played yesterday. And w/e the small update u made today. I cant play anymore.
